alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie; Huron; Morrow; Richland; Seneca (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 1:56AM EDT until April 01 at 2:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland County in north central Ohio... Huron County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Erie County in north central Ohio... Morrow County in north central Ohio... Crawford County in north central Ohio... * Until 245 AM EDT. * At 156 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bellevue to Chatfield to near Marion, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Sandusky, Norwalk, Bucyrus, Western Vermilion, Mount Gilead, Galion, Shelby, Bellevue, Willard, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, New London, Cardington, Bellville, Plymouth, Northern Milan, Milan and Wakeman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Erie; Huron; Morrow; Richland; Seneca
